title: Small Molecule Process Development
description:
Design Drug Substance chemical reaction process for target quality, safety, and cost performance

Synthetic process development is laboratory and library work to determine material synthesis and chemical reactions including process determination in order to make material specific market profile.

title: Biologics Process Development
description:
Enables true digital continuity to transfer the manufacturing Bill of Materials, Recipe and Methods into manufacturing faster and more efficiently

End to end digital process to manage cell lines, media, equipment and experiments for the development of Biologic materials.

title: Drug Product Development
description:
Digital system to develop Biologics Drug product and the processes for manufacturing and characterization using industry standard S88 process model

Drug product development is laboratory and library work to determine product composition including process determination in order to make material specific market profile.

description:

title: Design Failure Avoidance
description:
Plan and organize the product offer to meet the customer demand.

Define & Manage the product portfolio strategy that will enable to set configuration & variability standards, plan each evolution of the product, with committed requirements, planned features-options, configuration rules. Define and optimize product variability

title: Performance Validation Strategy Definition, Execution & Analytics
description:
Plan and organize the product offer to meet the customer demand.

Define & Manage the product portfolio strategy that will enable to set configuration & variability standards, plan each evolution of the product, with committed requirements, planned features-options, configuration rules. Define and optimize product variability

title: Know-how Capitalization & Automation
description:
Plan and organize the product offer to meet the customer demand.

Define & Manage the product portfolio strategy that will enable to set configuration & variability standards, plan each evolution of the product, with committed requirements, planned features-options, configuration rules. Define and optimize product variability

title: Weight & Balance
description:
Weight Driven Product Development.

Calculations of different KPIs : Weight, the center of gravity, inertia matrix,...

Real time review of KPI distribution reporting the progress and comparing with targeted values

title: Physical Product Architecture
description:
Manage multi disciplines Vehicle/Product Engineering Definition.

Enables high level physical product breakdowns to classify Multidiscipline Product Engineering IP. Facilitates concurrent engineering with efficient navigation through relevant ontologies (e.g. zone, discipline, responsibility, etc…).

title: Standard Component & Template Management
description:
Standardization, Know How Capture, Organization and Reuse.

Help customers to deploy an efficient and cost killer standardization process, aligned with business policy while increasing product quality.

title: Collaborative Enterprise Release
description:
Formal Release of Engineering Definition under change and Configuration.

Offering core services generic to all 3DEXPERIENCE Platform for Life Cycle, Versioning & Configuration, scalable to large data.

title: Extended Enterprise
description:
Collaboration between Enterprise and it’s ecosystem including Suppliers.

Global Collaboration between OEM and Suppliers is necessary to achieve development cycle reduction objective, quality while keeping innovation. Collaboration is usually organized in 3 categories.

title: 3D Digital Mockup Validation
description:
Ensure Mockup Consistency and Converge on Product Definition.

Identifying and resolving design issues earlier with Collaboration across disciplines around Digital Mock Up Review.

title: Collaborative Planning Execution & Analytics
description:
Deliverables based project management.

Data-driven portfolio view with governing projects and programs that leverage tasks and deliverables to find and mitigate risk.

title: Mobility Systems Architecture
description:
Early system validation via model animation and execution.

Define the missions through multiple connected systems at different lifecycle phases and considering all stakeholders.

title: Standard Component & Template Management
description:
Online Sourcing for Components (Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, …)

Optimize Sourcing process through RFx management to drive procurement and sourcing strategy. Discover and Qualify strategic partners on 3DS Marketplace.

title: Business Driven Portfolio & Product Planning
description:
Plan and organize the product offer to meet the customer demand.

Define & Manage the product portfolio strategy that will enable to set configuration & variability standards, plan each evolution of the product, with committed requirements, planned features-options, configuration rules. Define and optimize product variability

title: Assembly Robot Programming & Simulation
description:
Simulate and program Spot welding and driling & riveting robots

Achieve increased efficiency and improved quality with production automation using advanced industrial robots programmed and simulated advanced robotics solutions.

It is suitable for robot programming and simulation, where cables are subject to large deformations and high stresses in complex motion environments.

title: Stamping Die Engineering
description:
Capitalizing best design practices, provides engineering validation capabilities for tooling structure designer, unique Die Face design productivity

The CATIA Mold and Tooling Designer role enables a flexible and highlycustomizable approach from conceptual to detailed mold tooling design. This role enables the user to automate design tasks and assist user decisionmaking at any step of a complex mold design.

title: Vehicle Acoustics
description:
Playing it by ear: the importance of automotive acoustics

Provide better design solutions to customers while reducing cost & development time, through digital solutions for vehicle NVH & acoustics.

Although vehicle acoustics is just one of the many criteria involved in the development of a car, it has steadily gained in importance. On many occasions, the emphasis fields of vehicle development can result in a conflict of goals with acoustics.

title: Body Structure Concept Engineering
description:
Full digital continuity from end-to-end in a collaborative environment

The generation of geometrical and topological alternatives can be automated using SIMULIA Process Composer to study a high number of alternatives based on high quality multi-discipline simulation code. SIMULIA Result Analytics empowers advanced evaluation and trade-off studies.

title: Body Structure Engineering
description:
Full digital continuity from end-to-end in a collaborative environment

End to end Body in White Solutions is a transversal approach and means to enable the design right the first time. End to end Body in White Solutions provide a unified infrastructure to share whole data across the process with a variety of dedicated applications for each specific discipline.

title: Vehicle System Architecture
description:
Design, validate, deliver the intelligent vehicle experience

Define conceptual architecture from functional to sub-systems.

Vehicle System Architecture process brings disciplines together to define the vehicle conceptual system architecture

title: Performance Driven Architecture
description:
Converge on best solutions trade-offs, at conceptual level

Performance Driven Architecture & Multi-Disciplinary Trade-off solution enables cross-discipline design to be combined in a common environment that fully supports requirement capture, architecture definition, system modeling and virtual simulation.

Architects and simulation experts can better work together to virtually test and validate differentiating innovations, converging quicker with better trade-offs at conceptual level before going to detailed design.

title: Continuous Product Development
description:
Multi domain and multi tool collaborative capabilities under a single program governance

Detail product engineering for each domains (mechanical, electronic, software, etc.) in response to architecture definition to meet program KPIs. Leverage the appropriate native authoring solutions (including hybrid xCAD) and/or connectors to finalize design and offer core services generic to all 3DEXPERIENCE® platform for life cycle, versioning & configuration.

title: Airframe Sheet Metal and Machined Part Enfineering
description:
Efficiently design & deliver sheet metal components.

With Sheet Metal Engineering, designers can efficiently design complex sheet metal parts more quickly. An engineer works concurrently on the 3D model and flat pattern. The result is that when changes are made to the 3D model, the flat pattern updates automatically.

title: Airframe Composites Engineering
description:
Part of the Engineered to Fly industry solution, Composites Engineering offers robust design integration across multiple disciplines and provides increased confidence in the ability to increase production rates without compromising quality.

With Composites Engineering, accelerated maturity can be achieved thanks to digital continuity across all disciplines including engineering, analysis, manufacturing and quality control.

title: Part Fabrication Process Engineering
description:
Fabricate to specification with control and reconciliation of engineering intent and manufacturing specification.

Successful future factory manufacturing processes today rely on continuity and repetitiveness in design and execution processes. This is possible by relying on a platform where data and models can be shared and manufacturing plans can be accessed from anywhere during each manufacturing stage. Ready to Fabricate, part of the Ready for Rate industry solution experience, enables manufacturers to efficiently program for each manufacturing stage and use 3D instructions and reference designs from the design stage to the shop floor. Manufacturers can increase their efficiency and design to specification more effectively and optimize robotics and human factory labor.

title: Production Planning and Scheduling
description:

title: Electrical, Electronics and Software Architecture
description:
Provides a model-based approach supporting the end-to-end development of embedded systems.

The Electrical, Electronics and Software Architecture solution from Dassault Systèmes offers a model-based approach from requirements to functional, software and hardware architectures, supporting the end-to-end development of embedded systems. Combined with product diversity management, this solution fosters technology re-use across vehicle programs.

title: Vehicle Functional Safety
description:
Identify failure modes and asses gravity effects to build a safe design.

Estimate probability of occurrence of a system failure through computation of causes’ occurrence.

title: Integrated Software Engineering
description:
Connect software development content to the enterprise platform to release and manage a holistic, hardware/software definition.

Federate Software content metadata to 3DEXPERIENCE to leverage planning and governance of software development as part of the overall development plan of the product.

title: Embedded Software Engineering
description:
Design, test and deliver AUTOSAR compliant software components.

Dassault Systèmes Embedded Software Engineering solution is an open suite for the design and development of AUTOSAR-compliant systems and software. This solution offers embedded software developers a number of open-interface plug-ins, corresponding to different AUTOSAR development process phases that produce standard descriptions and information based on the AUTOSAR methodology and standard.

title: Electronics Design Integration
description:
Accelerate Electronics design process.

Speed up circuit board development by managing native Schematics and Layout files coming from legacy ECAD solutions, and improving the collaboration with mechanical design to deliver rigid or flexible electronics circuit board.

title: Wire Harness Electrical Engineering
description:
Design electrical wire harness and simulate performance.

Dassault Systèmes" Wire Harness Electrical Engineering solution enables end-to-end management of the electrical development environment from schematics through 3D design and simulation up to manufacturing preparation.

title: Vehicle Antenna Design & Placement
description:
Powerful and validate SIMULIA solutions meshing for complex geometry.

This process offers simulation workflows and tools for new antenna concepts for connected vehicle communication to be developed and tested quickly at a very early design stage, leading to better performance and a reduced overall device design time.

title: Electronics Signal & Power Integrity
description:
Meet Regulation for Signal and Power Integrity.

This process focus on signal and power integrity and EMC compliance simulation. Goal of the PCB simulation workflow is the 1st time right, implementing the virtual prototyping.

title: Electronics Electromagnetic Compatibility
description:
Safety and electromagnetic compliance.

The process offers EMAG and circuit simulation based workflow to predict radiated and conducted emission from power electronic printed circuit board.

title: Continuous Embedded Systems Testing & Validation
description:
Extend simulation usability to non-expert users with friendly interfaces.

Integrate, co-execute and validate continuously virtual heterogeneous models (model in the loop, software in the loop, hardware in the loop), via a real-time and interactive platform, enabling to reduce risks and to optimize testing cost & lead time performance.
